name: Dali
body:
DALI is a fast approximation of non-Gaussian likelihoods. It extends the well-known Fisher Matrix in a straightforward way. The code is written in C/C++.

### Documentation
The code has a Doxygen documentation and a handwritten manual. If the code gives you a hard time, please criticize the manuals before you criticize the code: the code had many, many test runs whereas the documentation had none. It is still subject to improvement and helpful criticism is very welcome.


### Credits
If you used DALI in a publication of yours, please cite the corresponding release papers:
* "Breaking the spell of Gaussianity: forecasting with higher order Fisher matrices", E. Sellentin, M. Quartin, L. Amendola, MNRAS,2014. arXiv 1401.6892
* "A fast, always positive definite and normalizable approximation of non-Gaussian likelihoods", E. Sellentin, 2015, Arxiv 1506.04866
* "Non-Gaussian forecasts of weak lensing with and without priors", E. Sellentin, B. M. Sch√§fer, ArXiv 1506.xyzz
